title: SCHOTT launches high-performance cover glass for next-generation space solar cells
description:
– SCHOTT® Solar Glass exos provides enhanced radiation resistance and optical performance for simple silicon cells up to III-V multijunction satellite solar cells.– Jointly developed with Heilbronn-based AZUR SPACE Solar […]

The post SCHOTT launches high-performance cover glass for next-generation space solar cells appeared first on SpaceNews.
